doc:
Belita Moreno https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Belita_Moreno 0 Aurabela "Belita" Moreno (born November 1, 1949) is an American actress best known for her roles as Benita "Benny" Lopez on the ABC sitcom George Lopez and Edwina Twinkacetti/Lydia Markham on Perfect Strangers. Aurabela_"_Belita_"_Moreno ( born November_1_,_1949 ) is an_American_actress best_known for her_roles as Benita_"_Benny_"_Lopez on the_ABC_sitcom_George_Lopez and Edwina_Twinkacetti/Lydia_Markham on Perfect_Strangers .
